title: John Butler
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225223733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225223733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : John Butler**

President of the one-man consultancy [Eccentrifuge, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225223733/http:/eccentrifuge.com/). Programs OpenType features and Python macros, and generates and tests fonts on platforms that many type designers prefer to avoid dealing with themselves. Knows a thing or two about blackletter and has no affection for font pirates.
author: filip blazek
